title: Whereas the commissioners appointed for rating and assessing the several subsidies granted to His Majestie by the Parliament, lately sitting in this kingdom, have in several counties neglected to make returnes of the estreates of the said subsidies into His Majesties Court of Exchequer ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, J. Roberts.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1669-1670 : Radnor)
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,
